subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Nicanor, a full brother of the 2006 Kentucky Derby champion, Barbaro, has been entered in a $40,000 maiden race over seven furlongs at Gulfstream Park on Saturday, his first outing since being injured in his career debut five weeks ago. Nicanor finished 10th in a 12-horse field on Jan. 28, after cutting himself with a misstep just out of the starting gate.
